text: 10.28: Ais 8.12-13 naŋga, Lu 12.4 naŋga, Je 4.12 naŋga, 1 Pi 3.14Kru pɨrɨ nɨñɨndurɨm mambɨŋitumara. Narɨŋandɨ kwɨrandɨmbatɨ ha yɨvutatamɨrɨmandɨyu, hara narɨŋandɨ mavɨñɨŋi ha mayɨvutatamɨrɨmandɨyu. Gotɨrɨmɨndaya pɨŋitumara. Nu taya narɨŋandɨ kwɨrandɨ naŋga mavɨñɨŋi ha pɨsiŋgarata, ahutuvarandi helɨyɨ kavarɨmandɨ.
